articles.title: Nintendo says it could brick Switch systems if users "bypass, modify, decrypt, defeat, tamper with" their games in updated agreement - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Following an update to the Nintendo Account User Agreement, the company has warned that it may brick Switch systems by those who “bypass, modify, decrypt, defeat, tamper with” their games. This particular agreement needs to be agreed upon before you can acces…

articles.title: Google Messages is starting to roll out ‘Delete for everyone’ - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google Messages for Android is getting the ability to delete a chat message for everyone in a group RCS conversation.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Features New Corning® Gorilla® Glass Ceramic 2 for Enhanced Durability - Samsung Newsroom
articles.description: With Corning’s leading-edge manufacturing technology, Corning® Gorilla® Glass Ceramic 2 offers engineered resilience on Galaxy S25 Edge, the slimmest Galaxy S series yet

articles.title: Apple has a new ‘Viral’ playlist on Apple Music and Shazam - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s new Viral Chart playlist features the top 50 songs discovered through Shazam.
